attributes.action: Make Ludlow, Shropshire part of Wales not England.
attributes.background: As a Town on The Border between England and Wales we would like a referendum on weather we should be part of England or Wales. Almost everyone I know is embarrassed to be English because The England Rugby Team are so embarrassing. Everyone I talk to agrees they would rather be Welsh

rejection.details: It's not clear whether this petition is asking for a referendum on this (as in the text of the petition) or simply for Parliament to make it happen (as in the title). You could start a new petition asking clearly for a specific action.
